DOC.brief_summary: Does sucrose or pacifier influence pain in premature babies when a nasogastric tube is inserted?
DOC.brief_title: Nasogastric Tube in Premature Babies - Pain and Treatment
DOC.detailed_description: A total of 24 premature babies are randomised to receive either placebo (sterile water), 30 % sucrose, or pacifier in a complete factorial, cross-over design. Pain is rated on the PIPP scale by observers blinded to the procedure other than use of pacifier.
DOC.criteria: 28 32 weeks gestational weeks not on mechanical ventilation high risk group regarding cerebral prognosis
